entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump The Trump administration turned to a former labradoodle breeder with little public health experience to oversee the day-to-day operations of the White House coronavirus task force in the early days of the pandemic, according to a new report.  Pathetic!!!!! Nothing great about it!
